alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN ITASCA, SOUTHEASTERN KOOCHICHING AND WEST CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 600 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Meadow Brook, or 27 miles west of Lake Vermilion, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Meadow Brook around 605 PM CDT. Gheen around 615 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Cook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis
